SEARCH
Package view

Interface ISimulatorUI

All Known Implementing Classes:
SimulatorGUI
public interface ISimulatorUI
Defines the contract for the simulator user interface (UI). Specifies the methods that must be implemented to manage the simulation parameters and results.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    appendResults(String text)
    Appends a results string to the UI output.
    int
    getCustomerAmount()
    Returns the total number of customers for the simulation.

    Returns the delay between events for the simulation.

    Returns the current simulation time.
    IVisualisation

    Returns the visualization component associated with the simulation.
    void

    Sets the arrival pattern of customers in the simulation.

    Sets the delay between events in the simulation.
    void

    Sets the ending time of the simulation.

  • Method Details

    • getTime

      double getTime()
      Returns the current simulation time.
      Returns:
      The current simulation time.

    • getDelay

      long getDelay()
      Returns the delay between events for the simulation. This value controls the speed of the simulation.
      Returns:
      The delay in milliseconds.

    • getCustomerAmount

      int getCustomerAmount()
      Returns the total number of customers for the simulation.
      Returns:
      The number of customers.

    • setEndingTime

      void setEndingTime(double time)
      Sets the ending time of the simulation.
      Parameters:
      time - The ending time to be displayed in the UI.

    • getVisualisation

      IVisualisation getVisualisation()
      Returns the visualization component associated with the simulation.
      Returns:
      The visualization component.

    • appendResults

      void appendResults(String text)
      Appends a results string to the UI output. Typically used to log the results or messages from the simulation.
      Parameters:
      text - The results text to be appended.

    • setDelay

      void setDelay(long delay)
      Sets the delay between events in the simulation.
      Parameters:
      delay - The delay in milliseconds.

    • setArrivalPattern

      void setArrivalPattern(ArrivalPattern arrivalPattern)
      Sets the arrival pattern of customers in the simulation.
      Parameters:
      arrivalPattern - The desired arrival pattern.
